Improvements.Improvement: Use early return for error checking
Improvements.Change_Diff: Removed the nested if-else statements for error checking and replaced them with early return statements.
Improvements.Description: Rather than having the error checks nested within the if-else statements, it would be more readable and efficient to use early returns.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Set instead of List for uniqueness checking
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replaced the Lists used for uniqueness checking with Sets.
Improvements.Description: For sessionTypes, sessionNames, and subProfilerIds, using a Set would be more efficient than a List for checking the uniqueness of the elements as the contains method of a Set has a time complexity of O(1) compared to O(n) for a List.
